in.teramatrix.googleservices.util

Class GoogleMapUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.googleservices.util.GoogleMapUtilities

  • public class GoogleMapUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Class has been constructed to collect some common utilities of Google Maps for example moving or animating map camera to particular location or on a group of locations, plotting marker, removing polylines etc.
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    3/21/2016

      Method will move camera to the group of LatLng objects with animation having default padding of 100
      static void dropPinEffect(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
      It's a small animation code to bounce selected marker on the map, To make animation, Bounce Interpolator has been used.

      Method will move camera to the group of LatLng objects without animation having default padding of 100

      This will simply remove polylines on the map

        This will plot marker on the map
        Parameters:
        map - on which marker has to be plotted
        position - on which position, marker has to be plotted

                                                                 java.lang.String title)
        This will plot marker on the map

        title - title text for info window

      • addMarker

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                                 com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng position,
                                                                 java.lang.String title,
                                                                 int icon)
        This will plot marker on the map
        Parameters:
        map - on which marker has to be plotted
        position - on which position, marker has to be plotted
        title - title text for info window
        icon - icon id for example R.drawable.ic_marker
        Returns:
        marker which has been added

      • addMarker

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                                 com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng position,
                                                                 int icon,
                                                                 boolean isCentered)
        This will plot marker on the map
        Parameters:
        map - on which marker has to be plotted
        position - on which position, marker has to be plotted
        icon - icon id for example R.drawable.ic_marker
        isCentered - it will set anchor(0.5f, 0.5f) if true
        Returns:
        marker which has been added

      • animateCamera

        public static void animateCamera(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                 com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng position,
                                 int zoom)
        This will simply animate the camera on to the position
        Parameters:
        map - Map
        position - on which position the camera will be animated/moved
        zoom - zoom level

      • moveCamera

        public static void moveCamera(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                              com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng position,
                              int zoom)
        This will simply move the camera on to the position
        Parameters:
        map - Map
        position - on which position the camera will be moved
        zoom - zoom level

      • animateCameraToGroup

        public static void animateCameraToGroup(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                        int padding,
                                        com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng... latLngs)
        Method will move camera to the group of LatLng objects with animation
        Parameters:
        map - on which the camera will be animated
        padding - from the border of map
        latLngs - comma separated LatLng objects that are to be included in group

      • animateCameraToGroup

        public static void animateCameraToGroup(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                        com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng... latLngs)
        Method will move camera to the group of LatLng objects with animation having default padding of 100
        Parameters:
        map - on which the camera will be animated
        latLngs - comma separated LatLng objects that are to be included in group

      • moveCameraToGroup

        public static void moveCameraToGroup(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                     int padding,
                                     com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng... latLngs)
        Method will move camera to the group of LatLng objects without animation
        Parameters:
        padding - from the border of map
        latLngs - comma separated LatLng objects that are to be included in group

      • moveCameraToGroup

        public static void moveCameraToGroup(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                     com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng... latLngs)
        Method will move camera to the group of LatLng objects without animation having default padding of 100
        Parameters:
        latLngs - comma separated LatLng objects that are to be included in group

      • setInfoWindow

        public static void setInfoWindow(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                 android.view.View view)
        Whenever user clicks on any marker on the map, an info window is visible. If there's a requirement to change the layout of default info window then this method may be helpful. In the method, getInfoContents() has been overridden to set up custom info window.
        Parameters:
        map - on which the info window has to be set
        view - custom layout

      • dropPinEffect

        public static void dropPinEffect(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        It's a small animation code to bounce selected marker on the map, To make animation, Bounce Interpolator has been used.
        Parameters:
        marker - which is to be bounced
